name: small_mobs_late_game
title: Nico's All Time Tiny Aliens
author: OmgItsNico
description:
This mod alters the spawning probabilities for spawners so that small biters and spitters never stop spawning completely while evolution rises.

At max evolution, about 1 in 100 spawned creatures will be a small biter or spitter.

This lets you hang on to your sense of superiority by letting you easily crush a tiny alien every now and then even at the later stages of the game.

Based on small_mobs_late_game by Colonizor
